Text: AVG reported this as a Win32/heur and stopped the download.

Nothing trips here.  When AVG reports Win32/heur it's a report from the heuristics module.  May or may not match reality as is the case with any heuristics model.  For the record, up to the minute here, two checkers with heuristics, no alarms.  FWIW.

BTW, excellent book.
